DOC.brief_title: Traditional Chinese Medicine Constitution Study Diagnosis Treatment Chronic Disease Taiwan Population
DOC.detailed_description: Aim : Several questionnaire develop clinical research Traditional Chinese Medicine . The objective study evaluate consistency relevance two questionnaire , Constitution Chinese Medicine Questionnaire ( CCMQ ) Body Constitutions Questionnaire ( BCQ ) . Method : Between December 2015 December 2016 , sample 150 participant age 20 year Chinese Medical University `` elder college '' curriculum outpatient Hospital Taichung , Taiwan , interview complete questionnaire base subjective symptom 3-d interval . There three common pattern body constitution CCMQ BCQ : gentleness/plain , Ying-deficiency , Yang-deficiency . As body constitution , Qi-deficiency , phlegm-dampness , dampness-heat , blood-stasis , Qi-depression , special diathesis describe CCMQ , stasis feature define BCQ . Average standard deviation use describe measurement score questionnaires percentage constitution distribution . Statistical analysis Kappa value , Pearson Chi-Square , odds ratio , Pearson 's correlation coefficient would employ examine consistency association two questionnaire . Expected result : The investigator hope 1 ) describe constitution profile study population ; 2 ) ass consistency two questionnaire ; 3 ) examine association CCMQ demographic life style factor .
DOC.criteria: people 20 year old people understand description questionnaire
